lead_paragraph: Ashley Alder, chief executive of the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission, said investors should watch out for volatility in high-flying stocks.

headline.main: After Plunge, Hong Kong's Securities Regulator Warns on Stock Values
headline.print_headline: After Plunge, Hong Kong's Securities Regulator Warns on Stock Values

snippet: Ashley Alder, chief executive of the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission, said investors should watch out for volatility in high-flying stocks.
